word:
“As we returned to our homes by various ways, a voice praising God would reach us from one direction, and, as if in response, voices from another 
184
and still another quarter, shouted, ‘Glory to God, the Lord reigneth!’ Men sought their homes with praises upon their lips, and the glad sound rang out upon the still night air. No one who attended these meetings can ever forget those scenes of deepest interest.
